entry.title: $2650 // GREAT 1 BEDROOM WITH PRIVATE BACKYARD, NEW APPLIANCES, AMAZING AREA!!!
entry.content:
EMAIL ME FOR VIEWING IT!
---
Nestled in the heart of Lenox Hill and conveniently located only steps away from all forms of transportation, including major trains and buses, this TRUE one bedroom apartment has a marble bathroom and hardwood floors. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances and LOTS of cabinet space. Great natural light floods the apartment. The bedroom can fit a queen size bed and includes a closet as well!
---
Access to your own private yard, perfect for pets or BBQs! Pet-friendly building!
---
This apartment has fast access to N, R W, 4, 5, 6 trains at 3rd Ave and 59. It just steps away from the 59th Street Bridge. It is in a great neighborhood with tons of bars and restaurants. Bed bath and beyond, Dangerfield's, The Home Depot, Serendipity, Sports Club La, Food Emporium, Movie Theaters, and Diners are ALL WITHIN A FEW BLOCKS OF THIS APARTMENT!!!
--- 0130
EMAIL ME FOR VIEWING IT!
